name: ExploRobots
description:
Made for Mini Jam 109.

Help the ExploRobots (Explore Robots) navigate through caves on their underground expedition!  Have the Bots work together by making new paths through 15 levels.

---In-Game Controls---

Arrow Keys / Wasd - Move

Z / Space - Jump

X / Enter - Deactivate Bot

R - Restart Level

---Menu Controls---

Arrow Keys / Wasd - Select

Z / Space / Enter - Confirm
